function.name: count
function.description: Count how many items in a list actually have a value. Ignores 0, false, "", empty.

argument.name: list
argument.description: The list of values to count.

function.name: $now
function.description: Current date and time as number of milliseconds since January 1st, 1970\. Mostly useful with [date and time functions](?category=datetime) or the `mod` operator.
